message: Let's be fair, I'll take the majority, but you get a decent chunk. Let me know what you think!
Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 40/60 split.  This reflects that there's value in reaching an agreement quickly.
Alright, I'm willing to compromise.  I'll take 75% and leave 25% for you. Let's wrap this up before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a 55/45 split, which is more than generous considering the time we've wasted and the value you're losing to inflation. Take the deal!
